#include<stdio.h>
int main(){
	long long n,k,i,j,count,l1,l2,a,b,t,min,l,r,p,c,ans;
	int ar[40];
	scanf("%lld",&t);
	while(t--){
		scanf("%lld",&n);
		l1=0;
		i=n;
		count=0;
		if(n==2){
			printf("0\n");
			continue;
		}
		min=10000000000000000;
		while(i>0){
			ar[l1++]=i%2;
			if(i%2==1)	count++;
			i=i/2;
		}
		a=1;b=0;
		ans=0;
		for(j=l1-2;j>=0;j--){
			
			if(ar[j]==1){
				
				b=1;
				i=count-a-b;
				l=l1-2+a;
				r=j;
				p=l-r;
				if((i-p)>0){
					if((i-p)%2==0){
						ans=l+(i-p)/2;
					}else{
						ans=l+(i-p)/2+1;
					}
				}else{
					ans=l;
				}
				if(min>ans)	min=ans;
				a++;b=0;
			
			}
		}
		if(ar[l1-2]==0){
			ans=l1-2+(count-1)/2;
			if((count-1)%2==1){
				ans++;
			}
		}
		if(min>ans)	min=ans;
		printf("%lld\n",min);
	}
	return 0;
}
